from enigma import eSize, ePoint, quitMainloop
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 100 wsizex = textsize[0] + 85 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (620 > wsizex): wsizex = 620 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, offset) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

from enigma import eSize, ePoint, quitMainloop
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 127 wsizex = textsize[0] + 85 + offset wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, 80 + offset) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
formsize = (wsizex, 127 + offset) self.instance.resize(eSize(*formsize))
newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))
